page_content: The page provides information on tax practices in the Canton of Bern for the tax year 2019.
The page discusses the income of children and its impact on tax deductions in the Canton of Bern.
The page provides guidelines on how to declare received gifts for tax purposes in the Canton of Bern.
The page provides information on recommended transportation methods for attendees of a soccer match between FC Thun and FC Basel.
The page discusses how to account for private usage of business assets in tax declarations in the Canton of Bern.
The page provides information on traffic disruptions due to the Tour de Suisse cycling event in the Canton of Bern.
The page provides information on traffic disruptions due to the 22nd Swiss Women's Run in the city of Bern.
